channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAuthenticator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAuthenticator

item.title: CVE-2021-43067|2024-08-04T03:47:13.216Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiauthenticator
item.description: A exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator version 6.4.0, version 6.3.2 and below, version 6.2.1 and below, version 6.1.2 and below, version 6.0.7 to 6.0.1 allows attacker to duplicate a target LDAP user 2 factors authentication token via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-43068|2024-08-04T03:47:13.493Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiauthenticator
item.description: A improper authentication in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator version 6.4.0 allows user to bypass the second factor of authentication via a RADIUS login portal.
